title: Bug 111481varargs doesn't work for ITD'd constructors
description: The following program doesn't compile:class MyClass {public static void main(String []argv) {new MyClass(new Object[]{"a","b","c"});new MyClass("a","b","c");}}aspect A {public MyClass.new(Object... names) {System.out.println(names[0]);}}(this is similar to bug 110906)
